beer.beer_description:
It was a tasting that started like any other. Yet the night that ensued became one for the history books. The beer we sipped was so golden and delicious that it had everyone and their dog celebrating into the wee hours of the morning. Such is the legend of our Tangle Foot.

Brewed by former head brewer John Woodhouse, this magical blend of Challenger and Goldings hops holds a delicate floral aroma and legendary status.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 480 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

items.checkin_comment: Sweet and fruity with a malty background

items.badge_description: Dispensed traditionally by hand pump, cask beers are best served at 55°F. This temperature allows all of the flavor nuances to emerge and permits appreciation of the often unfiltered texture. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Cask! Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 65 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 14!

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 55 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 12!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 420 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 320 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 65!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 175 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 36!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 345 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 70.

What's better than enjoying a beer outside with food, music, games all in an enjoyable atmosphere? We couldn't think of anything. That's a beer at 10 different venues with the category of Beer Garden. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

items.comment: There's no pubs in that town worth entering. Badger is tasteless
You are right about the beer but there is one pub, The Stour is a freehouse and the beer in there was good 👍

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 170 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 35!
